title: Anchovy Stock Recipe
full_text:
Anchovy Stock Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
20 mins
Active
10 mins
Total
20 mins
Serves
4 servings
Makes
1 quart
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
10
g
(about
1/3
cup
)
dried anchovies
4
cups
water
Directions
Bring water to a boil in a pot over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-high and add anchovies. Boil anchovies in water for 10 minutes, then drain liquid into container and discard anchovies. Use immediately, or refrigerate and use within 3 days for maximum freshness.
Notes
For more information on how to stock a Korean pantry, check out our article
here
.
